title: HEXTECH ON KATARINA
body:
Alot of you are going to hate me saying this if you are Kat mains, but I tend to build hextech first because of the DFG removal. It Deals magic damage and slows (For when you ult, they can only get away with a dash or flash). 

Does anyone else build it first?

You may go thru my match history to check it.

http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=wingedkeyboard

replies.body: No because I'm not a %%%%ing idiot

if you get rabas, zhonyas and void first, hextech makes a great item after you have those three because the active scales with AP so your essentially buying an extra ability to help you secure resets as well as boosting your stats, dont buy it first, your job is to do damage, not cc people

source - diamond kat main

If your building it for the slow, Rylai's kinda fills that as an AoE.

If your building it for the spellvamp/lifesteal get pots.

Fact is AP+magic pen does a lot more then surviving for a few extra second with your SV/LS and having a meh slow/Damage output.

Not the worst i guess, but it's not the best at all.
